games.title: RO:CK VR
games.description: This game was my final project for COMP-246 (Advanced Simulation) at Camosun College. Become a virtual reality monkey, swing around using a vine, and take revenge on the cavemen that ate your family.

games.title: Gun to the Power of Gun
games.description: This game was created for the Global Game Jam 2024 in Victoria. The main mechanic allows players to attach guns they pick up onto their current gun, leading to a huge variety of gun monstrosities.

games.title: Bartholomew Bone's Adventure
games.description: This game was my final project for COMP-245 (Artifical Intelligence) at Camosun College. It features multiple different AI agents, four different weapons, sliceable zombie limbs, and a final boss fight.

games.title: Hell NO
games.description: This game was created for the BIGA 5000$ Mini Game Challenge and won 3rd place. Play as a little spirit trying to escape hell by stacking objects up, while devious poltergeists try to knock you down.
